description.zh-cn: 由巴拿马的莫萨克·冯赛卡律师行于2016年泄露的1150多万份机密文件，揭露了世界各国政治人物、权贵财阀们刻意隐藏的海外资产。
description.en: Over 11.5 million confidential documents leaked in 2016 from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, revealing the hidden offshore assets of politicians and wealthy elites worldwide.

zh-cn: 莫萨克—冯赛卡律师事务所

description.zh-cn: 位于巴拿马的律师事务所，是世界第四大的离岸金融管理公司。“巴拿马文件”的来源。
description.en: A Panamanian law firm, the world's fourth-largest provider of offshore financial services, and the source of the Panama Papers.

description.zh-cn: 与《南德意志报》合作，组织全球媒体整理并公布“巴拿马文件”的调查记者组织。
description.en: An organization of investigative journalists that collaborated with Süddeutsche Zeitung to organize global media outlets to analyze and publish the Panama Papers.

description.zh-cn: 最初从匿名来源接收到“巴拿马文件”的德国报纸。
description.en: The German newspaper that initially received the Panama Papers from an anonymous source.

description.zh-cn: 于2015年向《南德意志报》提供“巴拿马文件”的匿名告密者。
description.en: The anonymous whistleblower who provided the Panama Papers to Süddeutsche Zeitung in 2015.

nodes.id: 西格蒙杜尔·戴维·贡劳格松

zh-cn: 西格蒙杜尔·戴维·贡劳格松
西格蒙杜尔·古恩劳格松

description.zh-cn: 冰岛前总理，因“巴拿马文件”揭露其未申报的离岸公司利益而引发抗议并辞职。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Iceland who resigned following protests sparked by the Panama Papers' revelation of his undeclared interests in an offshore company.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国共产党中央委员会总书记，其姐夫邓家贵被“巴拿马文件”提及。
description.en: Then General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, whose brother-in-law Deng Jiagui was mentioned in the Panama Papers.

description.zh-cn: 习近平的姐夫，被“巴拿马文件”揭露于2009年在英属维尔京群岛成立两间空壳公司。
description.en: Xi Jinping's brother-in-law, revealed by the Panama Papers to have established two shell companies in the British Virgin Islands in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 习近平的姐姐，邓家贵的妻子。
description.en: Xi Jinping's older sister and wife of Deng Jiagui.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理，其女李小琳被“巴拿马文件”提及。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, whose daughter Li Xiaolin was mentioned in the Panama Papers.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏之女，被“巴拿马文件”揭露以香港护照在列支敦士登成立基金公司。
description.en: Daughter of Li Peng, revealed by the Panama Papers to have used a Hong Kong passport to establish a foundation in Liechtenstein.

en: Hu Dehua (third son of Hu Yaobang)

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦三子，是中国大陆首位公开回应“巴拿马文件”事件的涉事者。
description.en: The third son of Hu Yaobang, and the first person implicated in mainland China to publicly respond to the Panama Papers incident.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记，其子胡德华被“巴拿马文件”提及。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, whose son Hu Dehua was mentioned in the Panama Papers.

description.zh-cn: 巴基斯坦前总理，因“巴拿马文件”揭露其家族拥有离岸公司而接受调查，最终被法院裁定不再符合担任公职的资格并辞职。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Pakistan who was investigated after the Panama Papers revealed his family's offshore companies, ultimately leading to his disqualification from public office by the court and his resignation.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府对“巴拿马文件”相关信息进行了网络审查和封锁。
description.en: The Chinese government censored and blocked information related to the Panama Papers online.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国外交部新闻发言人，他将“巴拿马文件”相关问题斥为“捕风捉影”。
description.en: Then-spokesperson for the Chinese Foreign Ministry, who dismissed questions about the Panama Papers as 'groundless'.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国外交部部长，是公开回应“巴拿马文件”风波的最高级别的中国官员。
description.en: Then-Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, who was the highest-ranking Chinese official to publicly comment on the Panama Papers affair.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯总统，其亲信谢尔盖·罗尔杜金被“巴拿马文件”提及。
description.en: President of Russia, whose close associate Sergei Roldugin was mentioned in the Panama Papers.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯大提琴家，普京的亲信，被“巴拿马文件”揭露拥有多家离岸公司。
description.en: A Russian cellist and close confidant of Vladimir Putin, revealed by the Panama Papers to own multiple offshore companies.

en: List of Prime Ministers of Iceland

description.zh-cn: 冰岛的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The position of the head of government of Iceland.

description.zh-cn: 匿名告密者“John Doe”于2015年向《南德意志报》提供了“巴拿马文件”。
description.en: The anonymous whistleblower 'John Doe' provided the Panama Papers to Süddeutsche Zeitung in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 《南德意志报》在收到文件后，与国际调查记者同盟分享并合作进行调查分析。
description.en: After receiving the documents, Süddeutsche Zeitung shared them with the International Consortium of Investigative Journalists and collaborated on the investigation and analysis.

description.zh-cn: 国际调查记者同盟组织了全球72个国家与地区的116个媒体组织，对“巴拿马文件”进行了一年的整理分析，并于2016年4月3日公布了初步结果。
description.en: The ICIJ organized 116 media organizations from 72 countries and regions to analyze the Panama Papers for a year, publishing the initial findings on April 3, 2016.

description.zh-cn: “巴拿马文件”的泄露揭露了莫萨克·冯赛卡律师行的内部运作和客户信息，对其声誉和业务造成了沉重打击。
description.en: The leak of the Panama Papers exposed the internal operations and client information of Mossack Fonseca, dealing a severe blow to its reputation and business.

relationships.target: 西格蒙杜尔·戴维·贡劳格松

description.zh-cn: 文件揭露西格蒙杜尔·戴维·贡劳格松拥有未申报的离岸公司利益，引发了冰岛大规模民众抗议，最终迫使其于2016年4月5日辞去总理职务。
description.en: The papers revealed that Sigmundur Davíð Gunnlaugsson had undeclared interests in an offshore company, sparking mass protests in Iceland that forced his resignation as Prime Minister on April 5, 2016.

description.zh-cn: 文件揭露纳瓦兹·谢里夫的子女拥有离岸公司，导致其接受调查，并于2017年7月28日被巴基斯坦终审法院裁定不再符合担任公职的资格，随后辞去总理职务。
description.en: The papers revealed that Nawaz Sharif's children owned offshore companies, leading to an investigation and his disqualification from public office by Pakistan's Supreme Court on July 28, 2017, after which he resigned as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: “巴拿马文件”披露了邓家贵于2009年在英属维尔京群岛成立两家空壳公司。
description.en: The Panama Papers disclosed that Deng Jiagui established two shell companies in the British Virgin Islands in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 邓家贵是习近平的姐夫。
description.en: Deng Jiagui is Xi Jinping's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 邓家贵是齐桥桥的丈夫。
description.en: Deng Jiagui is the husband of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习近平的姐姐。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is Xi Jinping's older sister.

description.zh-cn: “巴拿马文件”披露了李小琳通过一家在列支敦士登成立的基金公司持有离岸资产。
description.en: The Panama Papers disclosed that Li Xiaolin held offshore assets through a foundation established in Liechtenstein.

description.zh-cn: 李小琳是李鹏的女儿。
description.en: Li Xiaolin is the daughter of Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 胡德华是胡耀邦的三子。
description.en: Hu Dehua is the third son of Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·罗尔杜金自青少年时期就与普京相识，是普京的亲信。
description.en: Sergei Roldugin has known Vladimir Putin since their teenage years and is a close confidant.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府在“巴拿马文件”曝光后，在网络上对相关关键词进行了屏蔽和审查，并删除了相关报道和讨论。
description.en: After the Panama Papers were exposed, the Chinese government blocked and censored related keywords online, and deleted relevant reports and discussions.

position.en: Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs

description.zh-cn: 洪磊在外交部例行记者会上代表中国官方回应“巴拿马文件”事件。
description.en: Hong Lei responded to the Panama Papers incident on behalf of the Chinese government at a regular press conference of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 王毅时任中国外交部长。
description.en: Wang Yi was the Chinese Minister of Foreign Affairs at the time.

relationships.source: 西格蒙杜尔·戴维·贡劳格松

description.zh-cn: 西格蒙杜尔·戴维·贡劳格松担任冰岛总理，后因“巴拿马文件”事件辞职。
description.en: Sigmundur Davíð Gunnlaugsson served as Prime Minister of Iceland before resigning due to the Panama Papers affair.
